name: SCFrameStatus
desc: Status values for a frame from a stream.

items.name: case complete
items.desc: A status that indicates the system successfully generated a new frame.

items.name: case idle
items.desc: A status that indicates the system didn’t generate a new frame because the display didn’t change.

items.name: case blank
items.desc: A status that indicates the system didn’t generate a new frame because the display is blank.

items.name: case suspended
items.desc: A status that indicates the system didn’t generate a new frame because you suspended updates.

items.name: case started
items.desc: A status that indicates the frame is the first one sent after the stream starts.

items.name: case stopped
items.desc: A status that indicates the frame is in a stopped state.
